text: parA#~gaiqt tamEqtayA &nvaiqdakra#ndaqditiq tayAq vai sO$&gnEH priqyaM dhAmA&vA#rundhaq yadEqtAmaqnvAhAq-gnErEqvaitayA$ priqyaM dhAmA&va# rundha ISvaqrO vA EqSha parA$~g praqdaGOq yO vi#ShNukraqmAn krama#tE cataqsRuBiqrA va#rtatE caqtvAriq CandA(gm)#siq CandA(gm)#siq Kaluq vA aqgnEH priqyA taqnUH priqyAmEqvAsya# taqnuva#maqBi - [  ] 2
